codeSystems.name: CHEMEDEPRAmountQuantityUnitCode
codeSystems.title: Amount Quantity Unit Codes
codeSystems.description:
Unit Codes for amount quantity units.

These are all unit codes about amount quantities, excluding time units.

codeSystems.name: CHEMEDEPRRouteOfAdministration
codeSystems.title: Route of Administration
codeSystems.description:
Valueset RouteOfAdministration filtered for ambulatory care use.

This value set is a subset of the mandatory value set ([EDQM - RouteOfAdministration](http://fhir.ch/ig/ch-emed/ValueSet-edqm-routeofadministration.html)) that contains only values compatible with ambulatory care.
We recommend implementers to focus on supporting this value set instead of the complete one.

codeSystems.name: CHEMEDEprActSubstanceAdminSubstitutionCode
codeSystems.title: Substance Administration Substitution Codes
codeSystems.description: Codes in use to allow or deny medication substitution.

codeSystems.name: CHEMEDEPRTimeQuantityUnitCode
codeSystems.title: Time Quantity Unit Codes
codeSystems.description:
Unit Codes for time quantity units.

These are all unit codes about time quantities, excluding amount units.
